body: Hey guys, diamondporkchop3 here. I'm leaving for vacation tommorow. But I'm bringing my laptop, so I'll still play on Avicus (Unless the hotel has crappy Wi-Fi)! In case of that, I'll just stay on forums. I'll be gone for for days, I'll keep you updated! :P

title: Leaving for Vacation!
